update.description:
All command line tools have been refactored into one unified tool: gz. This matches functionality of other tools, like hg and git.

The usage is now: `gz <command> [options]`, where <commands> are string like "topic", "log", "joint", etc.

A complete list of commands is available by using gz with no arguments.

Help on each command is available using gz help <command>

Tab completion is also in effect. You'll need to manually install this file using: `sudo cp tools/gazebo.bash-completion /etc/bash_completion.d/`. This file will be installed when installing from [debian](#!/osrf/gazebo-release/pull-request/12/support-to-install-bash-completion-script/diff).

content.raw:
should this be
~~~
+  EXPECT_GT(model->GetWorldPose().pos.z, 0.5);
~~~
for the test to reflect gravity changes?
content.html:
should this be

+  EXPECT_GT(model->GetWorldPose().pos.z, 0.5);

for the test to reflect gravity changes?

content.raw: Sounds good.  This new check changes the current behavior by replacing NaN's with max range.  Was there an issue / bug report related to the update?  Will this break/fix codes that depend on output from this sensor?
content.html: Sounds good. This new check changes the current behavior by replacing NaN's with max range. Was there an issue / bug report related to the update? Will this break/fix codes that depend on output from this sensor?

content.raw: was there a bug report on this error?
content.html: was there a bug report on this error?

content.raw: Right, I've started the [issue in sdformat](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issue/51/sdf_version-need-to-distinguish-between). I'm preparing the PR. Feedback in the issue will be very appreciated.
content.html: Right, I've started the issue in sdformat. I'm preparing the PR. Feedback in the issue will be very appreciated.

content.raw: I think the problem is that the same cmake variables are used to specify the version number of the sdformat library version and the sdf xml files.
content.html: I think the problem is that the same cmake variables are used to specify the version number of the sdformat library version and the sdf xml files.

content.raw: New [jenkins build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/397/) using sdformat-prerelease 2.0.0. Looks like there are problems with the change of version with sdformat, I'm looking at them now.
content.html: New jenkins build using sdformat-prerelease 2.0.0. Looks like there are problems with the change of version with sdformat, I'm looking at them now.

content.raw: This should fix #1003
content.html: This should fix #1003

A complete list of commands is available by using gz with no arguments.

Help on each command is available using gz help <command>

Tab completion is also in effect. You'll need to manually install this file using: `sudo cp tools/gazebo.bash-completion /etc/bash_completion.d/`. This file will be installed when installing from [debian](#!/osrf/gazebo-release/pull-request/12/support-to-install-bash-completion-script/diff).
